price: Digo esto para que [mi esposo] sepa que no lo traicioné en su ausencia, y sé bien que Dios desbarata las intrigas de los traidores.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ لِيَعۡلَمَ أَنِّي لَمۡ أَخُنۡهُ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي كَيۡدَ ٱلۡخَآئِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika liyaʿlama annī lam akhun'hu bil-ghaybi wa-anna al-laha lā yahdī kayda al-khāinīna
